verses.verse: These <WH428> are the journeys<WH4550> of the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> which<WH834> went forth<WH3318> out of the land<WH4480> <WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> with their armies<WH6635> under the hand<WH3027> of Moses<WH4872> and Aaron.<WH175>

And Moses<WH4872> wrote<WH3789> <WH853> their goings out<WH4161> according to their journeys<WH4550> by<WH5921> the commandment<WH6310> of the LORD:<WH3068> and these<WH428> are their journeys<WH4550> according to their goings out.<WH4161>

And they departed<WH5265> from Rameses<WH4480> <WH7486> in the first<WH7223> month,<WH2320> on the fifteenth<WH2568> <WH6240> day<WH3117> of the first<WH7223> month;<WH2320> on the morrow<WH4480> <WH4283> after the passover<WH6453> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> went out<WH3318> with a high<WH7311> hand<WH3027> in the sight<WH5869> of all<WH3605> the Egyptians.<WH4714>

For the Egyptians<WH4714> buried<WH6912> all<WH3605> their firstborn,<WH1060> <WH853> which<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> had smitten<WH5221> among them: upon their gods<WH430> also the LORD<WH3068> executed<WH6213> judgments.<WH8201>
And the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> removed<WH5265> from Rameses,<WH4480> <WH7486> and pitched<WH2583> in Succoth.<WH5523>
And they departed<WH5265> from Succoth,<WH4480> <WH5523> and pitched<WH2583> in Etham,<WH864> which<WH834> is in the edge<WH7097> of the wilderness.<WH4057>

And they removed<WH5265> from Etham,<WH4480> <WH864> and turned again<WH7725> unto<WH5921> Pi-hahiroth,<WH6367> which<WH834> is before<WH5921> <WH6440> Baal-zephon:<WH1189> and they pitched<WH2583> before<WH6440> Migdol.<WH4024>

And they departed<WH5265> from before<WH4480> <WH6440> Pi-hahiroth,<WH6367> and passed through<WH5674> the midst<WH8432> of the sea<WH3220> into the wilderness,<WH4057> and went<WH1980> three<WH7969> days'<WH3117> journey<WH1870> in the wilderness<WH4057> of Etham,<WH864> and pitched<WH2583> in Marah.<WH4785>

And they removed<WH5265> from Marah,<WH4480> <WH4785> and came<WH935> unto Elim:<WH362> and in Elim<WH362> were twelve<WH8147> <WH6240> fountains<WH5869> of water,<WH4325> and threescore and ten<WH7657> palm trees;<WH8558> and they pitched<WH2583> there.<WH8033>
And they removed<WH5265> from Elim,<WH4480> <WH362> and encamped<WH2583> by<WH5921> the Red<WH5488> sea.<WH3220>
And they removed<WH5265> from the Red<WH5488> sea,<WH4480> <WH3220> and encamped<WH2583> in the wilderness<WH4057> of Sin.<WH5512>
And they took their journey<WH5265> out of the wilderness<WH4480> <WH4057> of Sin,<WH5512> and encamped<WH2583> in Dophkah.<WH1850>
And they departed<WH5265> from Dophkah,<WH4480> <WH1850> and encamped<WH2583> in Alush.<WH442>
And they removed<WH5265> from Alush,<WH4480> <WH442> and encamped<WH2583> at Rephidim,<WH7508> where<WH8033> was<WH1961> no<WH3808> water<WH4325> for the people<WH5971> to drink.<WH8354>
And they departed<WH5265> from Rephidim,<WH4480> <WH7508> and pitched<WH2583> in the wilderness<WH4057> of Sinai.<WH5514>
And they removed<WH5265> from the desert<WH4480> <WH4057> of Sinai,<WH5514> and pitched<WH2583> at Kibroth-hattaavah.<WH6914>
And they departed<WH5265> from Kibroth-hattaavah,<WH4480> <WH6914> and encamped<WH2583> at Hazeroth.<WH2698>
And they departed<WH5265> from Hazeroth,<WH4480> <WH2698> and pitched<WH2583> in Rithmah.<WH7575>
And they departed<WH5265> from Rithmah,<WH4480> <WH7575> and pitched<WH2583> at Rimmon-parez.<WH7428>
And they departed<WH5265> from Rimmon-parez,<WH4480> <WH7428> and pitched<WH2583> in Libnah.<WH3841>
And they removed<WH5265> from Libnah,<WH4480> <WH3841> and pitched<WH2583> at Rissah.<WH7446>
And they journeyed<WH5265> from Rissah,<WH4480> <WH7446> and pitched<WH2583> in Kehelathah.<WH6954>
And they went<WH5265> from Kehelathah,<WH4480> <WH6954> and pitched<WH2583> in mount<WH2022> Shapher.<WH8234>
And they removed<WH5265> from mount<WH4480> <WH2022> Shapher,<WH8234> and encamped<WH2583> in Haradah.<WH2732>
And they removed<WH5265> from Haradah,<WH4480> <WH2732> and pitched<WH2583> in Makheloth.<WH4722>
And they removed<WH5265> from Makheloth,<WH4480> <WH4722> and encamped<WH2583> at Tahath.<WH8480>
And they departed<WH5265> from Tahath,<WH4480> <WH8480> and pitched<WH2583> at Tarah.<WH8646>
And they removed<WH5265> from Tarah,<WH4480> <WH8646> and pitched<WH2583> in Mithcah.<WH4989>
And they went<WH5265> from Mithcah,<WH4480> <WH4989> and pitched<WH2583> in Hashmonah.<WH2832>
And they departed<WH5265> from Hashmonah,<WH4480> <WH2832> and encamped<WH2583> at Moseroth.<WH4149>
And they departed<WH5265> from Moseroth,<WH4480> <WH4149> and pitched<WH2583> in Bene-jaakan.<WH1142>
And they removed<WH5265> from Bene-jaakan,<WH4480> <WH1142> and encamped<WH2583> at Horhagidgad.<WH2735>
And they went<WH5265> from Horhagidgad,<WH4480> <WH2735> and pitched<WH2583> in Jotbathah.<WH3193>
And they removed<WH5265> from Jotbathah,<WH4480> <WH3193> and encamped<WH2583> at Ebronah.<WH5684>
And they departed<WH5265> from Ebronah,<WH4480> <WH5684> and encamped<WH2583> at Ezion-gaber.<WH6100>
And they removed<WH5265> from Ezion-gaber,<WH4480> <WH6100> and pitched<WH2583> in the wilderness<WH4057> of Zin,<WH6790> which<WH1931> is Kadesh.<WH6946>
And they removed<WH5265> from Kadesh,<WH4480> <WH6946> and pitched<WH2583> in mount<WH2022> Hor,<WH2023> in the edge<WH7097> of the land<WH776> of Edom.<WH123>

And Aaron<WH175> the priest<WH3548> went up<WH5927> into<WH413> mount<WH2022> Hor<WH2023> at<WH5921> the commandment<WH6310> of the LORD,<WH3068> and died<WH4191> there,<WH8033> in the fortieth<WH705> year<WH8141> after the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> were come out<WH3318> of the land<WH4480> <WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> in the first<WH259> day of the fifth<WH2549> month.<WH2320>
And Aaron<WH175> was a hundred<WH3967> and twenty<WH6242> and three<WH7969> years<WH8141> old<WH1121> when he died<WH4194> in mount<WH2022> Hor.<WH2023>

And king<WH4428> Arad<WH6166> the Canaanite,<WH3669> which<WH1931> dwelt<WH3427> in the south<WH5045> in the land<WH776> of Canaan,<WH3667> heard<WH8085> of the coming<WH935> of the children<WH1121> of Israel.<WH3478>
And they departed<WH5265> from mount<WH2022> Hor,<WH4480> <WH2023> and pitched<WH2583> in Zalmonah.<WH6758>
And they departed<WH5265> from Zalmonah,<WH4480> <WH6758> and pitched<WH2583> in Punon.<WH6325>
And they departed<WH5265> from Punon,<WH4480> <WH6325> and pitched<WH2583> in Oboth.<WH88>
And they departed<WH5265> from Oboth,<WH4480> <WH88> and pitched<WH2583> in Ije-abarim,<WH5863> in the border<WH1366> of Moab.<WH4124>
And they departed<WH5265> from Iim,<WH4480> <WH5864> and pitched<WH2583> in Dibon-gad.<WH1769>
And they removed<WH5265> from Dibon-gad,<WH4480> <WH1769> and encamped<WH2583> in Almon-diblathaim.<WH5963>
And they removed<WH5265> from Almon-diblathaim,<WH4480> <WH5963> and pitched<WH2583> in the mountains<WH2022> of Abarim,<WH5682> before<WH6440> Nebo.<WH5015>
And they departed<WH5265> from the mountains<WH4480> <WH2022> of Abarim,<WH5682> and pitched<WH2583> in the plains<WH6160> of Moab<WH4124> by<WH5921> Jordan<WH3383> near Jericho.<WH3405>
And they pitched<WH2583> by<WH5921> Jordan,<WH3383> from Beth-jesimoth<WH4480> <WH1020> even unto<WH5704> Abel-shittim<WH63> in the plains<WH6160> of Moab.<WH4124>
And the LORD<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> unto<WH413> Moses<WH4872> in the plains<WH6160> of Moab<WH4124> by<WH5921> Jordan<WH3383> near Jericho,<WH3405> saying,<WH559>

Speak <WH1696> unto<WH413> the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> and say<WH559> unto<WH413> them, When<WH3588> ye<WH859> are passed over<WH5674> <WH853> Jordan<WH3383> into<WH413> the land<WH776> of Canaan;<WH3667>

Then ye shall drive out<WH3423> <WH853> all<WH3605> the inhabitants<WH3427> of the land<WH776> from before<WH4480> <WH6440> you, and destroy<WH6> <WH853> all<WH3605> their pictures,<WH4906> and destroy<WH6> all<WH3605> their molten<WH4541> images<WH6754> and quite pluck down<WH8045> all<WH3605> their high places: <WH1116>
And ye shall dispossess<WH3423> the inhabitants<WH853> of the land,<WH776> and dwell<WH3427> therein: for<WH3588> I have given<WH5414> you<WH853> the land<WH776> to possess<WH3423> it.

And ye shall divide<WH5157> <WH853> the land<WH776> by lot<WH1486> for an inheritance among your families:<WH4940> and to the more<WH7227> ye shall give the more<WH7235> <WH853> inheritance,<WH5159> and to the fewer<WH4592> ye shall give the less<WH4591> <WH853> inheritance:<WH5159> every man's inheritance shall be<WH1961> in the place where<WH413> <WH834> <WH8033> his lot<WH1486> falleth;<WH3318> according to the tribes<WH4294> of your fathers<WH1> ye shall inherit.<WH5157>

But if<WH518> ye will not<WH3808> drive out<WH3423> <WH853> the inhabitants<WH3427> of the land<WH776> from before<WH4480> <WH6440> you; then it shall come to pass,<WH1961> that those which<WH834> ye let remain<WH3498> of<WH4480> them shall be pricks<WH7899> in your eyes,<WH5869> and thorns<WH6796> in your sides,<WH6654> and shall vex<WH6887> you in<WH5921> the land<WH776> wherein<WH834> ye<WH859> dwell.<WH3427>
Moreover it shall come to pass,<WH1961> that I shall do<WH6213> unto you, as<WH834> I thought<WH1819> to do<WH6213> unto them.
